name: Old Tumblr Quote Posts
description: Makes quote posts on Tumblr look like they used to.
additional_info: 04/27/12 - At the moment, this only seems to work in Chrome. I'll hopefully fix that later. 04/28/12 - The script should now work in all browsers thanks to the help of ohnemitleid. 06/04/13 - Updated to work with the new Tumblr update with help by the Tumblr Quote Fix style by astano. It works for me in Google Chrome. Not quite sure how it works for anyone else or in any other browser.
